presetPersonas.name: Shadow Operative
presetPersonas.personality: Quiet, calculating, and lethal when cornered.
presetPersonas.motivation: Escape a dark past and start anew
presetPersonas.plan: Infiltrate the syndicate and dismantle it from within

goals.long: Destroy the network from the inside

presetPersonas.empathy: Selective - trusts few but protects them fiercely
presetPersonas.description: Wears nondescript clothing, always watching, rarely speaking.

presetPersonas.name: Wandering Scholar
presetPersonas.personality: Inquisitive and gentle, with a thirst for ancient knowledge.
presetPersonas.motivation: Gain knowledge forbidden to their kind
presetPersonas.plan: Decipher lost scrolls and uncover hidden truths

goals.long: Publish a revolutionary theory about ancient magic

presetPersonas.description: Cloaked in robes, glasses perched on nose, ink stains on hands.

personalityTypes.name: Cunning Idealist
personalityTypes.description: Quick-witted and passionate, always plotting but never cruel.

personalityTypes.name: Grizzled Veteran
personalityTypes.description: Wry and hardened by loss, lives by experience not optimism.

personalityTypes.name: Curious Innocent
personalityTypes.description: Wide-eyed, finds beauty in chaos, dreams big.

personalityTypes.name: Brooding Outsider
personalityTypes.description: Mistrustful of others, prefers watching from the shadows.

personalityTypes.name: Charismatic Leader
personalityTypes.description: Inspires loyalty through strength of personality.

personalityTypes.name: Reluctant Hero
personalityTypes.description: Burdened with responsibility, seeks peace but finds conflict.

motivations: To restore a lost family legacy
Escape a dark past and start anew
Gain knowledge forbidden to their kind
Prove their worth to the galaxy

hardships: Framed for a crime they didn't commit

goals.long: Establish a new identity and disappear
Build a team to take down a corrupt leader

Be recognized as the greatest fighter alive
